page.description: The <OBJECT>.MAXIMIZE() method causes a window to fill the screen. If the window is hidden, the .MAXIMIZE() method will display it.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example loads, displays, and maximizes the Customer Information form window.
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.show() ptr.maximize()
